mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_menu ( menu_id, menu_name, menu_path, menu_comment, is_deleted, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, version) values (#{menuId}, #{menuName}, #{menuPath}, #{menuComment}, 0, now(), #{createBy}, now(), #{lastModifiedBy}, 0)
mapper.update: update t_sys_menu set is_deleted = 1, update_time = now(), update_user = #{userId}, version = version + 1 where menu_id = #{menuId}

update t_sys_menu set menu_name = #{menuName}, menu_path = #{menuPath}, menu_comment = #{menuComment}, update_time = now(), update_user = #{lastModifiedBy}, version = version + 1 where menu_id = #{menuId} and version = #{version}
mapper.select: select menu_id menuId, menu_name menuName, menu_path menuPath, menu_comment menuComment, version from t_sys_menu where menu_id = #{menuId} and is_deleted = 0
select a.menu_id, a.menu_name, a.version from t_sys_menu a where a.is_deleted = 0 order by a.create_time desc

select a.menu_id, a.menu_name, a.menu_path from t_sys_menu a where a.is_deleted = 0 and a.menu_id in ('2020042017250468782','2020042017253506989','2020042017272381188','2020042017283329858') order by a.create_time desc
